Subskills.name: Higher Frequency
Subskills.description: Increases attack speed when using vengeance.

Subskills.name: Uncontrolled Spike
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of lightning bolts from vengeance.

Subskills.name: Charge Release
Subskills.description: Lightning now releases pulses of lightning on hit dealing area of effect damage.

Subskills.name: Amped Amps
Subskills.description: Increases the lightning damage dealt by vengeance.

Subskills.name: Power Surge
Subskills.description: Increases the attack damage dealt by vengeance according to your strength.

Subskills.name: Recharging Strike
Subskills.description: Vengeance restores a portion of damage dealt as mana on hit.

Subskills.name: Overclock
Subskills.description: Vengeance has increased attack range. No longer requires hitting a target.

Subskills.name: Copper-plated Blade Edge
Subskills.description: Increases your attack rating when using vengeance.

Subskills.name: Self Shock
Subskills.description: Lightning bolts now inflict a portion of your total damage return as lightning damage.

Subskills.name: Direct Current
Subskills.description: Increases the length of lightning bolts.

Subskills.name: Destructive Voltage
Subskills.description: Vengeance's lightning bolts have a chance to inflict lightning break on hit.

Subskills.name: Alternative Current
Subskills.description: Vengeance's lightning bolts have a chance to zap monsters on hit dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Thunderbolt
Subskills.description: Strike monsters with additional bolts of thunder on hit.

Subskills.name: Electric Pillars
Subskills.description: Summon pillars of electricity to nearby monsters on hit.
